about.summary: We implement parametric and non parametric mediation analysis. This package performs the methods and suggestions in Imai, Keele and Yamamoto (2010) <DOI:10.1214/10-STS321>, Imai, Keele and Tingley (2010) <DOI:10.1037/a0020761>, Imai, Tingley and Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2012.01032.x>, Imai and Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1093/pan/mps040> and Yamamoto (2013) <http://web.mit.edu/teppei/www/research/IVmediate.pdf>. In addition to the estimation of causal mediation effects, the software also allows researchers to conduct sensitivity analysis for certain parametric models.

We implement parametric and non parametric mediation analysis. This package performs the methods and suggestions in Imai, Keele and Yamamoto (2010) <DOI:10.1214/10-STS321>, Imai, Keele and Tingley (2010) <DOI:10.1037/a0020761>, Imai, Tingley and Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2012.01032.x>, Imai and Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1093/pan/mps040> and Yamamoto (2013) <http://web.mit.edu/teppei/www/research/IVmediate.pdf>. In addition to the estimation of causal mediation effects, the software also allows researchers to conduct sensitivity analysis for certain parametric models.

name: r-mediation
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.5.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mediation
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mediation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mediation/mediation_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a18dde0aeb1341798c876abed469e05c40b47f2ab6afa08bb7ed2e4ed1063a5c

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'                        # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip                   # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}        # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-hmisc
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix
    - r-boot
    - r-lme4 >=1.0
    - r-lpsolve
    - r-mvtnorm
    - r-sandwich
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-hmisc
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix
    - r-boot
    - r-lme4 >=1.0
    - r-lpsolve
    - r-mvtnorm
    - r-sandwich

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mediation')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mediation')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://imai.princeton.edu/projects/mechanisms.html
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: We implement parametric and non parametric mediation analysis. This package performs the methods and suggestions in Imai, Keele and Yamamoto (2010) <DOI:10.1214/10-STS321>, Imai, Keele and Tingley (2010) <DOI:10.1037/a0020761>, Imai, Tingley and Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2012.01032.x>, Imai and
    Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1093/pan/mps040> and Yamamoto (2013) <http://web.mit.edu/teppei/www/research/IVmediate.pdf>. In addition to the estimation of causal mediation effects, the software also allows researchers to conduct sensitivity analysis for certain parametric models.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - leej3


# Package: mediation
# Version: 4.5.0
# Date: 2019-9-13
# Title: Causal Mediation Analysis
# Author: Dustin Tingley <dtingley@gov.harvard.edu>, Teppei Yamamoto <teppei@mit.edu>, Kentaro Hirose <hirose@princeton.edu>, Luke Keele <ljk20@psu.edu>, Kosuke Imai <kimai@princeton.edu>, Minh Trinh <mdtrinh@mit.edu>, Weihuang Wong <wwong@mit.edu>
# Maintainer: Teppei Yamamoto <teppei@mit.edu>
# Depends: R (>= 2.15.1), MASS, Matrix, mvtnorm, sandwich
# Imports: lpSolve, Hmisc, lme4 (>= 1.0), stats, graphics, grDevices, utils, boot
# Suggests: mgcv, quantreg, VGAM, SuppDists, survival, parallel, testthat, speedglm
# Description: We implement parametric and non parametric mediation analysis. This package performs the methods and suggestions in Imai, Keele and Yamamoto (2010) <DOI:10.1214/10-STS321>, Imai, Keele and Tingley (2010) <DOI:10.1037/a0020761>, Imai, Tingley and Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2012.01032.x>, Imai and Yamamoto (2013) <DOI:10.1093/pan/mps040> and Yamamoto (2013) <http://web.mit.edu/teppei/www/research/IVmediate.pdf>. In addition to the estimation of causal mediation effects, the software also allows researchers to conduct sensitivity analysis for certain parametric models.
# LazyLoad: yes
# LazyData: yes
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: https://imai.princeton.edu/projects/mechanisms.html
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-09-14 02:53:07 UTC; teppei
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-10-08 23:00:03 UTC
